body_html:
@zou3519 Thanks for the review and sorry for the delayed response. I can take a look at the comments and make the changes tomorrow - is your current rebasing effort addressing those too? I think with rebasing this is then close to ready to merge.

@lantiga My hope was to extend this to row2col and vol2col in the near future. If you have interest in helping with that it would be great.

body:
@zou3519 Thanks for the review and sorry for the delayed response.  I can take a look at the comments and make the changes tomorrow - is your current rebasing effort addressing those too?  I think with rebasing this is then close to ready to merge.

@lantiga My hope was to extend this to row2col and vol2col in the near future.  If you have interest in helping with that it would be great.
